name: Andrzej Ito
profile_summary: As an L3 IT Engineer, I possess extensive expertise in **M365**, **Azure**, **VMware**, and **VDI solutions**, with over 9 years of experience in managing and implementing cutting-edge software solutions. Proficient in **Intune**, **SCCM**, and administering **Microsoft Active Directory** and Domain Controllers, I effectively deploy and manage group policies, **DNS**, and **Windows Server** environments including 2016, 2019, 2022, and 2025. My strong focus on solution scalability, accessibility, and user-centric design has allowed me to lead cross-functional teams successfully, mentoring junior engineers along the way. Adept in **Defender for Endpoint**, **Dell VxRail**, **PowerStores**, and **PowerProtect Backup/Cyber Recovery**, I am committed to technical excellence and innovative problem-solving in every project.
